data.title: 8 Rue des Pirogues de Bercy - Office Space in 12th Arrondissement
data.meta_description: With sleek private offices, all-inclusive amenities, and a vibrant community, WeWork‚Äôs Bercy office space is a launchpad to success. Schedule a visit today.
data.text:
Channeling the design, creativity, and community of this vibrant area, WeWork‚Äôs beautiful shared office in Bercy caters to entrepreneurs and established companies alike. The entire eight-story building is dedicated to WeWork, allowing your team to brainstorm in art-filled lounges, take meetings in a range of modern conference room, then touch base in your own sleek private office. Commuting is a breeze with onsite parking and the tube at Cour Saint-Emilion just a two-minute walk away. After work, explore the shops in Bercy Village or head to Parc de Bercy for a breath of fresh air. A charming neighborhood of paved streets and converted 19th-century warehouses, inspiration is never far away in Bercy‚Äîand our shared office at 8 Rue des Pirogues de Bercy completes the experience. Schedule a visit today.
